text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ito'ati Alloh va Pajomʙar va ululamri musalmonon kuned va har kas ki Pajomʙarro pajravi kunad, Allohro pajravi kardaast. Ammo mas'ulin va hukamo zamone ʙa farmon ʙurdan az onho dastur doda mesavad, ki farmoni onho gunoh naʙosad. Va cun dar cize ixtilof karded, onro ʙa Alloh va Pajomʙar ʙargardoned, agar ʙa Alloh va ruzi qijomat imon dored, in ʙaroi sumo ʙehtar va xustar ast
